sentences.en: Churlish: like, or befitting a churl ; boorish or vulgar.
sentences.cn: 象或适合粗鲁人的; 粗鲁的或庸俗的.

sentences.en: He would not offer a churlish roof to his visitors.
sentences.cn: 他十分小气,连住宿都不愿给来访者安排.

sentences.en: I ejaculated mentally , " you deserve perpetual isolation from your species for your churlish inhospitality.
sentences.cn: ”我心里直叫, “ 只为你这样无礼待客,就该一辈子跟人群隔离.

sentences.en: I ejaculated mentally ,'you deserve perpetual isolation from your species for your churlish inhospitality.
sentences.cn: 我心里直叫, 只为你这样无礼待客,就该一辈子跟人群隔离.

sentences.en: It seemed churlish to refuse his invitation.
sentences.cn: 拒绝他的邀请似乎有些失礼。

sentences.en: It would be churlish to refuse.
It would be churlish to tie strings to our help.
sentences.cn: 把我们的援助加上一些附加条件,那是吝啬的.

sentences.en: It would've been mean and churlish to say no.
sentences.cn: 如果我再说不的话就会变得很小气和无礼了.

sentences.en: It'seemed churlish to refuse his invitation.
sentences.cn: 拒绝他的邀请似乎很无礼.

sentences.en: It'seems churlish to refuse such a generous offer.
sentences.cn: 拒绝这样慷慨的建议未免有些失礼.

sentences.en: She offered them cups of tea and it seemed churlish to refuse.
sentences.cn: 她不停给他们倒茶，回绝的话又好像没礼貌。

sentences.en: She offered them cups of tea and It'seemed churlish to refuse.

sentences.en: She would think him churlish if he refused.
sentences.cn: 他要是拒绝的话，她就会认为他不够友好。

sentences.en: The room was so lovely it seemed churlish to argue.
sentences.cn: 房间太漂亮了，要是再争辩的话就会显得很无礼。

sentences.en: The room was so nice it seemed churlish to argue.
sentences.cn: 这房间这么好，吵架的话就显得无礼了。

sentences.en: Yet if you complain about these, you seem ungrateful – if not just plain churlish.
sentences.cn: 可是如果你抱怨这些, 不是单纯的粗鲁的话,就有点忘恩负义了.
